Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI can quickly adapt to my learning style

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI's feedback is very quick and I get immediate answers and suggestions. This instant feedback is very convenient, especially when I have specific problems in my studies or work. I can ask questions at any time without having to wait for the teacher's response

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teachers are more diffuse thinkers, unlike AI's answers
